section_titles.1: What awaits me if i join?

sub.0: Is an open community of thousands of people, together targeting the root causes of any and all societal issues. We create easy and fun Positive Action activities to empower people and communities everywhere to build World they want to live in
sub.1: You'll be a part of a Global Movement on a mission to change the World. Using simple, fun activities to achieve a friendlier, happier and more at peace future. Meeting positive, pro-active, awesome new friends both locally, and globally
sub.2: Is simply: donâ€™t live in frustration at what others are not doing. Lets come together and do it ourselves! Unite and take responsibility for health and happiness of life where we live ..and lets make change fun!

section_titles.3: 4. Choose a specific meeting point (hidden on street sleeper map) Point
section_titles.4: 5. How will people recognise you? (hidden on street sleeper map)

0.0: Not sure? Here's a list of suggestions:
0.1: (if the Positive Action you want to create isn't there let us know at contact@focallocal.org) Give your Positive Action a name

sub.2: Enter address or postcode/zip - or choose from commonly used meeting points in that city, (clicking on a commonly used point auto-fills that location into the text entry box).
sub.3: Be as specific as possible. Next to a statue? North, West of a bridge? Not sure? Check Google Earth for a good meeting spot.
sub.4: Carrying a Teddy Bear on your Shoulder? Wearing a bright yellow hat? wearing a Focallocal badge or T-shirt?
